user.title: Wrist Assistant
user.description: This enables Wrist Assistant delta-sync and creates a ready-to-scan pairing QR in Home Assistant.

pairing.title: Scan pairing QR code
pairing.description:
Open the Wrist Assistant app and choose **Long-Lived Access Token**, then tap **Scan Integration QR**.

![Wrist Assistant Pairing QR]({qr_url})

Click **Submit** when done.
